title: title to show
codename: code name to use in settingsGateway.User.items
summary: a short summary of what this item does/is

statistics.key: name of settingsGateway.User key to modify if item is used (must exist)
statistics.set: whether to set or increase (default = increase, false)

temporary: an item that should last temporarily (default = false)
temporaryTime: after what amount of time the item should expire in ms

title: :bank: **Bank Account Upgrade**
summary: Upgrade your bank account once, regardless of the maximum.

title: :llama: **Llama**
summary: Spit anyone who tries to rob you for the next 12 hours.
